text: myxococcus anthes is one of the best
studied organisms around and it's well
known for two kinds of social behavior
it clumps together when food is scarce
produce spores and it organizes
wave-like attacks on other species of
bacteria in nature all this goes on in
the soil under our feet for many many
kinds of bacteria scientists have used
new techniques in electron microscopy to
show just how it communicates to
organize these papers what they see is a

how myxococcus organizes its wave-like
attacks physical links like this are
